kindred.network

Class Server

  • Object
    • kindred.network.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Server
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Implements the main loop of a TCP listening socket Server.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port used by the Server.
      private ServerSocket serverSocket
      Server's listening TCP socket.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loop()
      Initializes this Server's socket and accepts connections from Clients, creating a new socket and thread to treat each connected user.
      static void main(String[] args)
      Starts a Server.
      void run()
      Thread used for verifying if Server must be closed (this happens when "CLOSED" is typed).

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void loop()
        Initializes this Server's socket and accepts connections from Clients, creating a new socket and thread to treat each connected user.
